## Description {#details}

### TmpHelper {#aad14c90e3b9b65e18878f4ccb283d2cc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt;BitstreamRemarkSerializerHelper&gt; llvm::remarks::BitstreamMetaSerializer::TmpHelper</>}>
This class can be used with &#91;1&#93; a pre-constructed <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializerhelper">BitstreamRemarkSerializerHelper</a>, or with &#91;2&#93; one that is owned by the meta serializer.

In case of &#91;1&#93;, we need to be able to store a reference to the object, while in case of &#91;2&#93; we need to store the whole object.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h/#l00165">165</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer-h">BitstreamRemarkSerializer.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
